subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Jack Hannahan hit that leadoff single and later drove in two runs, and Jack Cust hit a two-run homer as the host Oakland Athletics completed a three-game sweep with a 6-3 victory Sunday.
snippet: Jack Hannahan hit that leadoff single and later drove in two runs, and Jack Cust hit a two-run homer as the host Oakland Athletics completed a three-game sweep with a 6-3 victory Sunday.
